comments.text:
You seem to have a very deep folder hierarchy.
In that case this problem happens, I confirm it.
The width of the folder tree is set to the width of the folder chooser control
The UI question is what should happen in this case. Maybe it is a property of the chooser widget and would need to be fixed in core Toolkit.
